<Transition>.description: Provides animated transition effects to a single element or component.

<TransitionGroup>.description: Provides transition effects for multiple elements or components in a list.

<KeepAlive>.description: Caches dynamically toggled components wrapped inside.

<Teleport>.description: Renders its slot content to another part of the DOM.

<Suspense>.description: Used for orchestrating nested async dependencies in a component tree.
